content: flower trellis square by carolyn calderon a flower center that expands into a circle and then turns into a square this twelve inch square features lots of texture made with basic crochet stitches chain single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet includes a video tutorial and written instructions written in us terminology yardage & gauge please see pattern website for more information thank you for your interest in my designs have a great day carolyn text and images c the purple poncho all rights reserved
